Class AlbumListAdapter

    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<com.haydende.heymusic.AlbumListAdapter.AlbumViewHolder>

  • public class AlbumListAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<com.haydende.heymusic.AlbumListAdapter.AlbumViewHolder>
    Subclass of RecyclerView.Adapter that adapts the Album data for use in UI components.
